original_text:
How long must I see the battle standard
    and hear the sound of the trumpet?
korean_text: 내가 저 깃발을 보며 나팔 소리 듣기를 어느 때까지 할꼬

sentences.original_text: How long must I see the battle standard
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 얼마나 오래 전투 깃발을 보아야 합니까

sentences.original_text: and hear the sound of the trumpet?
